title: The case of lay-communion with the Church of England considered and the lawfulness of it shew'd from the testimony of above an hundred eminent non-conformists of several perswasions.
author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Written by John Williams.  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Fourth title in: A collection of cases and other discourses, v. 1.
